bibl.title: Access to Law in Late Antiquity: Status, Corruptions, and the Evidence of the "Codex Hermogenianus".
bibl.note: Diss. Yale Univ. Summary in DA 65 (2004-2005) p. 4307-A. - Uses papyri and inscriptions to re-evaluate from the point of view of the users existing models of the system of petition-and-response, a method of seeking justice widely used by non-elites.
